channel.title: Homes on The Lost & Found
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on The Lost & Found

item.title: Good Quotes
item.description: “I am not lost, for I know where I am. But however, where I am may be lost.” - A.A. Milne

item.title: In the beginning...
item.description: The beginning is where most things begin, but not this story. But, don’t worry we’ll get to the beginning in due time. For millennia, most people - shamans, priests, religious leaders, regular folk, astronomers/astrologers (for most of history these were the same profession) - just assumed that the universe was static, it had always existed and probably always would. Even into the modern day (from The Enlightenment onward), many scientists also assumed that the universe had always existed.

item.title: A Study in Scarlet
